name: Apache & Overdrive Demo
overview: Released free with other Team 17 games, this full version of Apache and demo of Overdrive was first released in 1993. It was created by the team of David J. Broadhurst, Haydn Dalton and music by Allister Brimble (The Demon). Apache is a Choplifter/Fort Apocalypse type scrolling horizontal helicopter shooter, while Overdrive is a very good overhead racing game. Apache was never released separately.
